message:
Match is redundant. It's recommended to rewrite it as 'if b
                                                       then
                                                         match letexpr with
                                                         | Ast.Abs (arg, e)
                                                             ->
                                                             let rec recclos
                                                               =
                                                               (name,
                                                                 (EClosure
                                                                    (arg, e,
                                                                    recclos)))
                                                               :: env in
                                                             eval recclos
                                                               (steps - 1)
                                                               inexpr
                                                         | _ ->
                                                             Res.fail
                                                               "not a function"
                                                       else
                                                         (let* code =
                                                            eval env
                                                              (steps - 1)
                                                              letexpr
                                                           in
                                                          eval ((name, code)
                                                            :: env)
                                                            (steps - 2)
                                                            inexpr)'
